item.title: Everybody's so Creative!
item.description: After 4 years with Rust, I love the language – but I’m starting to think the ecosystem has an abstraction addiction. Or: why every Rust crate feels like a research paper on abstraction.

item.title: Godot Ruined My Sense of Speed
item.description: Godot didn’t just ruin my game. It ruined how I think about performance and abstraction. What started as a simple voxel prototype spiraled into an existential crisis

item.title: Four years, Five failures, One compiler
item.description: At 14, I thought writing a compiler would be a quick side quest in building a game engine. Four years later, I finally built one that works. And it was one hell of a journey.
